title: Kovakkara Kiliye Lyrics Vel
stanzas: <div>Kovakkara Kiliye Lyrics Vel

Kovakara kiliye
enna kothi vittu pogathe
aruvamanaiyai pola
nee puruvam
thookki kaattathe (2)

Etho etho konjam
vali kooduthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?
eno eno nenjam
kudai saaiyuthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?

Kovakara kiliye
enna kothi vittu pogathe
aruvamanaiyai pola
nee puruvam
thookki kaattathe

Ye sooriyakanthi
poova pola
mogatha thiruppuriye

nee sozhatti potta
sozhiya pola
sethari oduriye

Hey azhaga nee
ithama pesi aala usuppuriye
un kirudha mele
methuva saaya
enna thurathuriye

Mailapooru mayile
oru iragu podama
en sontha ooru madura
ada thalli nilaaiya

Urugaatha ponnumilla
udaiyaatha pennumilla
sarithan podi pulla

Meiyaatha aadumilla
meiyaatti pullumilla
solla thevaiyilla

Etho etho konjam
vali kooduthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?
eno eno nenjam
kudai saaiyuthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?

Kovakara kiliye
enna kothi vittu pogathe
aruvamanaiyai pola
nee puruvam
thookki kaattathe

Chittira maasa veyila pola
soota kelappuriye
nee pottal kaattu pulidhi
kaathaa enna suthuriye

Patramathu thangam pola
mousa kaatturiye
nee pakkaththu veettu
muruka pola
murukka irukkirye

Pathiram pota
kaiyaal oru
pathiyam podaiyaa?

Pattaa neeyum
thanthaal naan
paire vaippene

Pasi thaagam thonavila
paduthaalum thookkamila
kadhal ithu thaana?

Kannadi parthathu illa
munnadi neeyumila
kadhal ithu thaana?

Oh yetho yetho konjam
vali kooduthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?
yeno yeno nenjam
kudai saaiyuthe
ada kadhal ithu thaana?

Kovakara kiliye
ennai kothi vittu pogathe
aruvamanaiyai pola
nee puruvam thookki kaattathe
